Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation that works towards helping people and groups in Burngreave to co-operate, communicate and work together. Also acts to ensure that the community of Burngreave's voice is heard on a wider level. Holds quarterly forum meetings to discuss issues affecting the area. Has a number of working groups which focus on different areas of concern eg adult learning, youth provision and health and housing. Is an information hub for the area.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 3 months on a Saturday (Forum meetings)
